WorkItem.Description:

Using 2.2.10

Description: No item returned from Armory for 40767

Comments.Message: For some reason, it doesn't like your Sonic Booster... Perhaps that item isn't parsing correctly, I'll take a look at it.
(In the mean time, relog without that item, and try again)
(Or, better yet, try adding that item from Wowhead)
Same for Darkmoon Card: Crusade, Stonebreaker Totem, Primitive Mantle (6134).  Some items can be resolved via Wowhead, others not at all.
